TopicTitle: Realistic Satellite Option in the Game Creator

Articles.Content:
Hey I am DPPCGaming. I would like to talk about a feature that I am waiting for, for quite some time now. This feature I dont think is (correct me if I am wrong) implemented in the game yet and it will enable the player to tick the box at the start of a new game which will add a whole new different gameplay into KSP. This feature is where devices have connection with the main base and each other. A bit like RemoteTech I think. This will add a whole new realistic feature into the game also allowing the satellite antennas to be more useful.
